name: match number lists
help: Returns two lists of booleans, one for each input list (same length) - items are true if the number at their index is found in the other list.

list1 matches.description: list of booleans: true if number at this index in list 1 was found in list 2

list2 matches.description: list of booleans: true if number at this index in list 2 was found in list 1
